column4: uhh.. hi.. can anybody tell me how do i track software installed? i know theres synaptic but theres like a thousand stuff in there.. i just dont know where to look.. cause sometimes i uninstall stuff with add/remove but they are still around like the restricted extras.. any help much appreciated thanks in advance =)
Despite your statement Synapric is still the best tool to look for installed software.
ok thanks.. ill go check the manual for synaptic
